TtsSpan.DateBuilder().Description: Creates a builder for a TtsSpan of type @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#TYPE_DATE_E@.

Parameters: int: The value to be set for year. See @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ARG_YEAR_E@.
int: The value to be set for day. See @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ARG_DAY_E@.
int: The value to be set for weekday. See @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ARG_WEEKDAY_E@.
int: The value to be set for month. See @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ARG_MONTH_E@.

TtsSpan.DateBuilder(java.lang.Integer,ja.Description: Creates a builder for a TtsSpan of type @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#TYPE_TIME_E@ and possibly sets the @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ARG_WEEKDAY_E@, @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ARG_DAY_E@, @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ARG_MONTH_E@ and @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ARG_YEAR_E@ arguments. Pass null to any argument to leave it unset.
TtsSpan.DateBuilder(java.lang.Integer,ja.FullName: public TtsSpan.DateBuilder (Integer weekday, Integer day, Integer month, Integer year)

ClassDesc: A builder for TtsSpans of type @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#TYPE_DATE_E@.
